title: Mexico Border, Brexit & Mueller
itunes:title: Mexico Border, Brexit & Mueller
description:
Kevin spoke with Philip Bump, National correspondent Washington Post, Professor Brian Brenberg, Chair of the Program in Business and Finance and Associate Professor of Business and Economics at The King’s College in New York City, Manny Garcia, Executive Director for the Texas Democratic Party, and Congressman Dan Crenshaw. They discussed the Mexico border, the latest Brexit developments, the Mueller report, and Linda McMahon plans to resign as SBA administrator.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
